dcterms:creator: R. Sennrich
B. Haddow
A. Birch
dcterms:description: The WMT14 English-to-German translation task dataset includes 4.43 million bilingual sentence pairs from the WMT14 corpora, with the newstest2013 and newstest2014 data sets used as the development and test sets, respectively.
dcterms:title: WMT14 English-to-German (EN-DE) Translation Task

dcterms:creator: K. Chen
R. Wang
M. Utiyama
E. I. Sumita
dcterms:description: The NIST Chinese-to-English translation task dataset consists of 1.28 million bilingual sentence pairs from the LDC corpora, where the NIST06 and the NIST02/NIST03/NIST04 data sets were used as the development and test sets, respectively.
dcterms:title: NIST Chinese-to-English (ZH-EN) Translation Task
